title: Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect purchase. Would buy again :)
items.body: Wish it came in other colors. Super comfortable, very professional. Love love love! Read more
items.author: Sabrina Stanley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bonito
items.body: Muy bonito pero no me lo pude ni medir por qué a el momento de bajar el cierre quedó atorado y se abrió no sé si a mí me salió el cierre defectuoso pero lo demás muy buena calidad de tela Read more
items.author: Jpiedra

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short!
items.body: Love this dress! It’s much shorter than what I hoped but definitely able to make it work! Read more
items.author: BeBe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy
items.body: Very very sexy dress. If you don't have a man wear this out and you will by evenings end. Very comfortable and fits like a glove with the perfect amount of stretch. Great quality and worth every penny. Read more
items.author: Amazonian Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as advertised
items.body: Sleeves were loose and fabric was thin. It did not look like the photo. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Evening Dress
items.body: I'm 5'2" 164lbs 38H and I bought the large, it fits okay but I think X-large might have been a bit more comfortable, the square neckline really flatters my shoulders and collarbone and the lace patch on the side adds a nice elegant touch. I wore it to a Halloween dinner cruise and also tried it on for a small cocktail party and the side slit made it easy to move without feeling restricted. The fabric is soft but thick enough that it seems like it will last and not stretch out. The stitching and lace feel solid. I like that it has a bit of stretch so it hugs curves without being tight, seems worth the money. Read more
items.author: J S

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs 2 sizes too small
items.body: Runs very small, the XL size fits about 2 sizes too small. Strong compression material. Not soft or comfortable Read more
items.author: Laurie A.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Dress
items.body: The material it’s good quality. Nothing was wrong with the dress. But I didn’t like how it fit me. I return it. And got my money back. I order large but I think medium would fit better. Read more
items.author: Mari

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, A-black, Blue, Lighted Blue, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
